snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for interesting items. Today's selection includes items on file sharing as a religion in Sweden and a mobile acquisition by Walmart.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for interesting items. Today's selection includes items on file sharing as a religion in Sweden and a mobile acquisition by Walmart.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: A Walmart Acquisition and African Song-Swapping
